plot: A scientist obsessed with the past transports himself back in time to 18th-century London, where he falls in love with a beautiful young woman.
title: The House in the Square
plot_es: A scientist obsessed with the past transports himself back in time to 18th-century London, where he falls in love with a beautiful young woman.
